seniority_level.evidence: 5-8+ years of experience required, which aligns with senior level expectations for data engineering roles

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines, processing, and transformation

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions 'streaming pipelines', Kafka, and real-time data processing alongside batch processing with Spark

leadership_expectation.evidence: Senior level role (5-8 years) suggests technical leadership without direct reports, working in consulting environment

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS explicitly mentioned multiple times with specific services: AWS EMR, AWS Glue, DataBricks, AWS RedShift, DynamoDB

secondary_clouds.evidence: Only AWS cloud services mentioned, no other cloud providers referenced

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions both streaming pipelines (Kafka) and batch processing with Spark Framework

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned (no Airflow, Dagster, etc.), only Spark Framework referenced

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions AWS RedShift (data warehouse) and HDFS/Hadoop ecosystem (data lake patterns)

remote_restriction.evidence: No remote work model mentioned, location specified as Pune, India with no remote restrictions discussed

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements mentioned, location is India but no timezone overlap requirements specified

relocation_required.evidence: No relocation requirements mentioned, role based in Pune, India with no mention of moving requirements

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned in job posting, typical for India-based positions

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No student visa support mentioned, role requires 5-8 years experience suggesting professional level position

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization requirements mentioned in job posting

w2_vs_1099.evidence: No employment type or contract structure mentioned in job posting

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, compensation, or perks mentioned in job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career growth, advancement opportunities, or promotion paths mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs or working with senior staff mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression mentioned

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, IC paths, or management paths mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Extensive list of must-have technical skills with specific years of experience requirements (5-8+ years total, 5+ in Big Data, 3+ on AWS)

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description clearly defining data engineering role with specific technical responsibilities and requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skill requirements (5-8 years experience, Spark/Python/AWS) are reasonable and appropriate for senior data engineer level
